fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use a player's corpse or raise a zombie (Alive)
- Use a zombie or raise a zombie (Dead)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may raise a zombie of any role that could spawn in a possible role slot (example: if there's no Plaguebearer, Neutral Chaos, or Any, you cannot raise a Plaguebearer), but you may not raise roles that cannot spawn naturally
- You may not raise a zombie of a killing role, but you may convert a Killing role that is dead (does not matter if it has rot) to a zombie
- Necromancer and Retributionist will see a Killing corpse as missing if you converted it to zombie
- You can always see a list of zombies you have made
- When controlling the Traitor, you may use your ability to kill with them instead
- Roleblock and Control Immune
